body.text: We detected suspicious activity on your account from the ip {{user.source_ip}}{% if user.city %} from {{user.city}}, {{user.country}}{% elsif user.country %} from {{user.country}}{% endif %}. Logins from this IP have been blocked on your account. If this is your IP, please reset your password to unblock your account. Otherwise, disregard this message.
body.voice: We detected suspicious activity on your account from the ip {{user.source_ip}}{% if user.city %} from {{user.city}}, {{user.country}}{% elsif user.country %} from {{user.country}}{% endif %}. Logins from this IP have been blocked on your account. If this is your IP, please reset your password to unblock your account. Otherwise, disregard this message.
